mapper.insert: insert into web5_member (id, password, name, phone, address, email) values (#{id},#{password},#{name}, #{phone}, #{address},#{email})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from web5_board
where title like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'

select boardnum, id, title, contents, to_char(inputdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') inputdate, hits, originalfile, savedfile from web5_board
where title like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' order by boardnum desc
mapper.update: update web5_board set hits = hits+1 where boardnum like #{boardnum}
update web5_board set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, inputdate = default where boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.insert: insert into web5_reply (replynum, boardnum, id, text) values (web5_reply_seq.nextval, #{boardnum}, #{id}, #{text})
